Inglewood.Murdock Stadium:
Murdock Stadium is a stadium on the campus of El Camino College in Torrance, California.
Built in 1958 the stadium seats around 12,127 on wood-backed bleacher seats. It was home to the North American Soccer League's Los Angeles Aztecs for two years (1975–1976) as well as several United States men's national soccer team FIFA World Cup qualification matches.
